title: shared pics folder do not appear if shared from subfolder
body:
## expected behaviour
* show images of a shared folder within "shared from" section at the share-recieving user pictures app

## actual behaviour
* works if the folder is in root
* shows the folder as "shared" in own folder section - which is wrong. this should not happen. but also shows the right folder in the "shared from" section.
* works **not** if the shared folder is within a subfolder. it makes no difference if any of the folder paths contain entities. the "shared from" section appears but remains empty.

* dunno if so. on my server it is.
